Dana’s dark ethereal feel, with rows of guipure panelling and delicate straps make this the perfect night and day timeless piece, to be worn with strappy heels and a sheer maxi skirt. Add a deep red lip to Dana for even more glamour.

Adding a Spanish vibe in feminine 100% cotton voile ruffels , Cata’s bardot  cropped style will emphasise your waist and clavicle. Accessorize with an oversized earrings, or leave your look simple and sleek and let Cata do the talking.

The iconic beauty of Kayla ensures this is a piece made for the long Summer days; Kayla will be sure to accentuate your sunkissed glow, and the guipure details and tie waist mean Kayla can emphasize your waist for a perfect butterfly silhouette.

A nostalgic innocence evelops our Indya caftan.
Made with our symbolic cotton voile and embellished with guipure geometric motifs to finish the contour of our caftan and adorn its sleeves.
The Indya Caftan was designed to take full advantage of the long summer days.
Combine it with your favorite swimsuit or with short and crop top from our collection for an ideal look that can take you from the beach club to sunset.

An incredibly versatile and elegant piece to add style to any beach outfit. 
The softness of the cotton combined with the elaborate sleeves, adornes with geometric guipure motif, make this piece a "must" for the summer.
Synch in the delicate lace belt at the waist to emphasise your narrowest point elevating your look whilst letting your swinsuit shine throught.

The perfect peplum silhouette sets our iconic Edda jacket apart, and the finer details of cut out guipure, tie waist, and delicate frill details on the sleeves mean that Edda is a completely unique piece. Versatile in it’s specifics of looking as good on the beach as it would in the evening, Edda is a necessity for the Summer months.

Rock Ali with a backless bathingsuit or bikini to emphasise the guipure back panels; Summer is a time for accentuating the golden glow of your skin, and Ali allows you to do so. With pointed guipure sleeve edging and maxi length, Ali is the ideal accompaniment to your Summer day or evening look.

Greta’s scalloped guipure edging and skater style would look fun and flirty styled with a simple bodysuit and lace up sandals, or thrown on with a bikini top for a relaxed, straight-off-the-beach vibe.

Short, ruffle details, accompanied with a waistband to highlight you exactly where you want, and fun, flouncy detailing makes Fera the perfect skirt for a night of twirling under the Ibiza sunset.

We re launch one of our “best sellers,” our iconic peasant-cut cotton voile long skirt. On this occasion, the Ruth skirt arrives stronger than ever thanks to its triple tier, enriched with elaborate guipure entredoses and the stunning cascade cut that blends these three sections seamlessly. The hypnotic volume of the skirt culminates in a sash-shaped waistband that kisses the hips contouring the silhouette. This makes Ruth an incredibly flattering and comfortable garment with the undisputed Charo seal.

A figure hugging, detailed pair of shorts, Ida works just as well paired with our sleeve blouses or crop as it does with a bodysuit that shows off the patterned panels. The scalloped guipure edging will skim across the thigh to accentuate that summer glow.

A beautifully cut dress, with a tight fitting bodice, large, guipure frills and a layered, panelled and asymmetric skirt, Vaiana is undeniably flattering and feminine.

Marylin's floral scallop details, criss cross back and skater skirt finish scream femininity and Summer night; a middle section that's crammed with beautiful detailing adds to the effeminate air of Marilyn.
This piece in its version black or white belongs to our permanent collection Essentials by Charo Ruiz.
A timeless "must have" made with love from Ibiza

A dress that works as well in the daytime as it does at dusk, Joya’s beautiful intricate scallop finish will draw attention to the sunkissed glow you’ve achieved throughout those lazy Ibiza afternoons.

The flared sleeve detailing and guipure bardot necline give this dress an effortless, feminine feel.
Throw on after a day at the beach to look like nothing but effort has been made;
relaxed waves and a nude lip wuold elevate Campana ever further.
This piece in its version black or white belongs to our permanent colection Essentials by Charo Ruiz.

Our Aida dress was born as an ode to sensuality celebrating the femininity of the beautiful curves of your body. Its "V" shaped neckline is mirrored on the back show casing the full potential of the cinched in torso design thanks to the fitted elastic panel. The frills contour the back and neck of the dress and flutter towards the waist. Elaborate guipure enhances several points of the dress including the waist and the end of the hip, flirting with volume as the dress cascades to a midi length. Without a doubt, our Aida dress is the epitome of free spirited romantic style.

This piece in its version black or white belongs to our permanent collection Essentials by Charo Ruiz. A timeless "must have" made with love from Ibiza

With triangular cups, scalloped guipure edging and slit in four; Imagine is feminine and pretty.
An open, criss cross back adds something to Imagine, and the maxi finish means Imagine is the perfect accompaniment to a Summer's day.

With triangular cups, scalloped guipure edging and slit in four; Imagine is feminine and pretty.

The long Cindy dress is an unavoidable “must” of summer. The triangular sections of cotton covering the chest enhance the flattering V-shaped neckline creating the effect of spectacular contoured cleavage. They are held by two, beautiful, very thin straps. A band of openwork guipure tailors in at the waist drawing attention to the narrowest point of your body which enhances the sublime volume of the peasant-cut skirt formed by three frills. The combination of the soft cotton and the peek a boo transparencies creates a sensual contrast that will set hearts aflutter.

Description: Our beautiful Lita bustier is an essential for your "Resort looks" Its flattering sweetheart neckline enhances the chest creating a radiant silhouette. Its structured body made of embroidered cotton contours the torso and its elasticated back panel adapts perfectly around your figure. Its side zip closure makes this bustier an easy and comfortable garment to wear. Lita looks incredible in color, white, black or in our stunning embroidered print. Combine with shorts or pants from the Breezy Batista collection.

Description: Verna is our versatile version of a blazer designed to look like a dress or alternatively mix it up for a fresh take on a two or three piece look. Its crossed lapel and openwork sleeve create its flattering shape allowing the blazer to be worn open or closed to create a “short dress” effect. Embroidered cotton brings an element of freshness to the piece. Combine it in any of our three colors, with our Olive shorts or with our Brigid pants and one of our crop tops to create a stunning 3-piece effect.

Description: Our flattering olive shorts made of lightweight embroidered cotton are the perfect addition for all your “Resort looks”. The woven belt highlights your narrowest point and sits comfortably around the waist. The delicate transparency of the embroidered cotton makes Olive the perfect garment to look beautiful without having to compromise on comfort. Combine the shorts with high-heeled sandals and one of our crop tops from the “Breezy Batista” collection to get the WOW factor.

Our beautiful Lita bustier will add a feminine touch to all your summer looks. Its flattering sweetheart neckline is finished with a delicate trim of 100% cotton geometric guipures, enhancing the chest area and creating a radiant silhouette. Its structured body contours the torso and its elastic back adapts perfectly to your figure thanks to its side zip closure. A pretty and delicate piece to wear with our long Kareen skirt from this collection or our Olive short from the "Breezy Batista" collection.

A charismatic bucolic piece that adds a rustic touch to your style, enhancing your natural beauty. 
The elastic body contours the torso and accentuates the bust, the voluminous sleeves add a charming touch transforming the Judy Crop top into a timeless beauty. Combine it with our long Ann skirt from this collection for a look that resembles a flowing dress. Wear it with cowboy boots for a free-spirited twist.

Our beautiful Angie top wraps around your waist in a blend of botanical motifs, enhancing the natural shape of your chest with its flattering V-neckline which is adorned with 100% geometric cotton guipures. Its side tie closure makes our Angie top a very comfortable piece to wear. The volume of its balloon sleeve, with the adjustable cuff makes this garment a very versatile piece. Combine it with our mini Rada skirt for a cool twist or with one of our long skirts for a mesmerizing summer look.

The central button closure and the flattering cut of the fitted peplum waist makes our Carolyn blouse the piece you will not want to miss out on this spring/summer. The volume in the sleeves and the adjustable cuff create a beautiful puffed silhouette enriched by our botanical print. Combine it with our mini Rada or with jeans for a relaxed "streetwear" look.

Rada is the versatile short skirt that will match all your summer tops. Its flattering silhouette hugs the waist and slips lightly over the hips accentuating the free-flowing, flirty, godet panels which resemble the beauty of flowers blooming in spring. A skirt made of printed cotton voile and adorned with 100% geometric cotton guipures. Let yourself be swept away by the soft summer breeze in this ultra fresh, delicate piece.

The beauty of our Ann skirt lies in its countryside inspired design and the sensuality of the front slit with hidden buttons. The buttoned waist band is extremely flattering, wrapping around your silhouette highlighting your narrowest point before cascading down into a beautiful ruffle design along the trim. Combine it with our Judy top and one of our natural fiber bags for the perfect match.

Our print with botanical motifs and its flattering "A" cut give the long Kareen skirt a free-spirited, ethereal movement. Its high waist and the natural fall of the 100% cotton voile, open on both sides, creates a beautiful silhouette. Combine it with one of our crop tops or blouses from the "Botanika" collection for a summer statement look.

Fall for the perfect fit of our short Lili dress as you step into summer. The beautiful V-neckline on the back and on the chest falls effortlessly from the bust thanks to its cape-like silhouette. The pretty, babydoll design with its stunning botanical print combined with the ruffled finish adds a flattering free-flowing ease to the way the garment moves. Wear it with high esparto wedges to achieve an "effortlessly chic" look.

Marlene is the “little summer dress” that must be added to your summer wardrobe. The flattering backless design with the delicate strap adjustment system ensures the perfect fit. Its flattering silhouette hugs the waist and slips lightly over the hips accentuating the free-flowing, flirty, godet panels which resemble the beauty of flowers blooming in spring. The Marlene dress will make you look effortlessly beautiful on any occasion.

Our Maureen mini button up shirt dress is the versatile summer staple you need this spring/summer. Its skirt can be adjusted easily by pulling on the ties to enhance the silhouette of the dress, cinching you in at the waist. Leave the ties loose for an "oversized" look or tighten them for a draped mini effect. The volume of the balloon sleeves can be easily adjusted thanks to the elastic cuffs. Combine it with cowboy style boots for a boho look or with esparto wedges to elongate your legs.

Mae is our asymmetrical long dress with a versatile double function, Mae can be used as a dress or as a skirt. Its elastic body (smock) adjusts to the shape of your bust and the skirt is supported by an invisible central buttoning system. Slide the dress down to turn the elastic body into a comfortable band that wraps around your hips transforming our Mae dress into a beautiful skirt. Combine it with a pair of cowboy boots for a fresh, spring festival look.

The cascading ruffles and the subtle asymmetry cut of our Joyce dress creates a mesmerizing flair. Its "V" neckline and empire cut enhance the chest area. The delicate straps are made of a geometric guipure design which also adorns the lining around the chest area. Joyce is the perfect dress for an evening under the moonlight just add a pair of our statement earrings and wedges or for a casual day look add a pair of strappy sandals.

The volume of the puffed sleeves and the “V” neckline with scalloped geometric guipures creates a romantic, feminine silhouette. The intricate detail of the fitted waist falls to a flowy countryside-style skirt trimmed with a ruffled edge which adds to the breezy movement of the piece. A dress to enjoy the freshness of the long-awaited spring. Combine it with some espadrilles and our Iraca palm jellyfish bag for a casual evening look.

Stay cool this summer in our Janette mid-neck shirt dress with a Mao neckline. A long, versatile, dreamy dress that can be worn closed as a shirt dress or alternatively leave it open to create a beautiful "V" neckline whilst creating the illusion of longer legs! The length of the balloon sleeves on the Jeanette dress can be adjusted easily with the elastic cuff, undo a few buttons to let the skirt's ruffle flow in the summer breeze as you saunter along the shore.

The flattering "A" silhouette and the beautiful open back in a criss-cross design makes our Debbie dress a "summer staple" for all your upcoming events. A dress that embodies sensuality, adding a touch of romance to all your looks thanks to the beautiful 100% printed cotton voile, its flattering V-neckline and the flirty side slits of the skirt flutter in the summer breeze.

Step into summer with our Veronica top. The stunning double ruffle falls lightly over the shoulders and the intricate guipure adorns the body adding a touch of elegance to this special crop top. The open back and the movement of the ruffles enhance the chest area. The Veronica is a one of our season staples adding a breath of vitality to all your summer looks. Combine it with our Shelly skirt to get the perfect "twin set" to dance all night under the moonlight.

A versatile garment to combine with our Ann maxi skirt to get an incredible look for sunset or with our mini Shelley for a fresher look.

fabric pocket that will contain the filter.
*The filter is not sold together with the facemask.
